trans-unit.source: Hosting Behind a Firewall with Service Bus
trans-unit.target: Hosting Behind a Firewall with Service Bus

trans-unit.source: This topic describes several ways to connect to <token>sb2</token> from behind a firewall or through a proxy server.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes several ways to connect to <token>sb2</token> from behind a firewall or through a proxy server.

trans-unit.source: The following troubleshooting topics discuss common solutions to problems encountered when you connect to <token>sb2</token> through a firewall.
trans-unit.target: The following troubleshooting topics discuss common solutions to problems encountered when you connect to <token>sb2</token> through a firewall.

trans-unit.source: Configure the ports on your firewall
trans-unit.target: Configure the ports on your firewall

trans-unit.source: To use the <token>sb2</token> relay, ensure that your firewall allows outgoing TCP communication on TCP ports 9350 to 9354.
trans-unit.target: To use the <token>sb2</token> relay, ensure that your firewall allows outgoing TCP communication on TCP ports 9350 to 9354.

trans-unit.source: To use WebStreams over HTTPS, you must allow outbound HTTPS connections to port 443.
trans-unit.target: To use WebStreams over HTTPS, you must allow outbound HTTPS connections to port 443.

trans-unit.source: If you are running behind a firewall or proxy that requires authentication, or if you are running in an IPsec-protected network, there are additional obstacles for any client to reach the network proxy.
trans-unit.target: If you are running behind a firewall or proxy that requires authentication, or if you are running in an IPsec-protected network, there are additional obstacles for any client to reach the network proxy.

trans-unit.source: For example, Windows accounts might not have permissions to communicate through the firewall.
trans-unit.target: For example, Windows accounts might not have permissions to communicate through the firewall.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might have to explicitly configure the WinHTTP proxy settings with the appropriate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Therefore, you might have to explicitly configure the WinHTTP proxy settings with the appropriate credentials.

trans-unit.source: Setting the connectivity mode to HTTP (that is, <codeInline>ConnectivityMode = http</codeInline>) may cause connections in the presence of some proxies to be very slow.
trans-unit.target: Setting the connectivity mode to HTTP (that is, <codeInline>ConnectivityMode = http</codeInline>) may cause connections in the presence of some proxies to be very slow.

trans-unit.source: For example, some connections can require up to 20 seconds to connect.
trans-unit.target: For example, some connections can require up to 20 seconds to connect.

trans-unit.source: Extending the <languageKeyword>OpenTimeout</languageKeyword> option for the service to up to two minutes can help, because you might run out of time between the acquisition of the token and getting the web stream working.
trans-unit.target: Extending the <languageKeyword>OpenTimeout</languageKeyword> option for the service to up to two minutes can help, because you might run out of time between the acquisition of the token and getting the web stream working.

trans-unit.source: After the web stream is established, the throughput often improves.
trans-unit.target: After the web stream is established, the throughput often improves.
